name: Jashinism
description: Jashinism is a death cult whose followers, Jashinists, believe their deity demands utter death and destruction. They frame their killings as a public service, saving people from the fear of death. Ritual prayer and sacrifice are central to their faith.

initiation.requirements: Take 100 lives of the weak, 10 of the strong, or 5 Jashinists (or any combination worth 100 points: strong=10, Jashinist=20)
initiation.afterInitiation: Receives divine orders to join the cult and is recruited by followers.

doctrine: Pray to Jashin before a fight for a 'good kill'.
Pray for forgiveness if unable to kill or if a kill is not preceded by prayer.
Proper prayer is required for kills to count and to maintain favor.

skill.name: Jashinism
skill.advancement: +1 per proper prayer/sacrifice (weak), +10 for strong sacrifices, -10 for failures or improper ritual, 1 hour repentance required for failures.

holySymbol.name: Jashin Necklace
holySymbol.requirement: Must always wear and protect; used for all prayers.

rituals.prayer: 10 minutes before and after each kill; treated as Stunned during prayer.
rituals.seasonalOffering: At least 10 lives per season must be offered.

blessings: As faith and offerings grow, followers gain divine revelations, hidden and forbidden techniques, or lose favor if slothful.
